descript.abstract: Perennial and intermittent rivers and streams with widths equal to or less than 20 feet as determined from 1988 aerial photography -1988 wetlands

cntorgp.cntorg: Rhode Island Department of Environmental Management

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.0.1770

dataqual.complete: RIGIS standards rms-005 fuzzy-002; topologically complete arc info line coverage

citeinfo.title: final report-wetlands data IEP Inc Feb. 1990

srcinfo.srccontr: IEC Inc provided black and white aerial photography

procstep.procdesc: Hydrolines were scribed directly on photographs and transferred to Mylar manuscripts with 1988 RIGIS roads and manually digitized from table.
Updated Point of Contact information for this dataset from "RIGIS Coordinator" to "Paul Jordan."

cntorgp.cntorg: University of Rhode Island Environmental Data Center

procstep.procdesc: Converted E00 file to shapefile. First, imported E00 using the "Import from E00" tool; next, used the "Feature Class to Shapefile" to convert the coverage to a shapefile.

cntorgp.cntorg: University of Rhode Island Environmental Data Center

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates
